item.title: Quit massing
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

[code]class : client
server: should work for anny
dificalty : 2/10

open up your client. java
LOOK for

Code:

boolean process()

then add this under it
Code:

if(sameclick == 5)
sendMessage(“STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [8/10]”);
if(sameclick == 6)
sendMessage(“STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [9/10]”);
if(sameclick == 7){
sendMessage(“STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK![10/10]”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player : “+playerName+” was massing CORZZSCAPE_SERVER kicking "+playerName;
disconnected = true;}

Should look like this

Code:

public boolean process() {

if(sameclick == 5)
sendMessage(“STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [8/10]”);
if(sameclick == 6)
sendMessage(“STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK! [9/10]”);
if(sameclick == 7){
sendMessage(“STOP MASSING OR YOU WILL BE KICK![10/10]”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Player : “+playerName+” was massing CORZZSCAPE_SERVER kicking "+playerName;
disconnected = true;}

Now IF your server has these ints then you should be set if not declare
Code:

public int oldclick = 0;
public int sameclick = 0;

nexted look for
Code:

case 241:

and replace the case with this
Code:

case 241: // mouse clicks
int mouseclick = inStream.readDWord();
if(oldclick == mouseclick)
sameclick += 1;
else
sameclick = 0; // resets because the click has changed
oldclick = mouseclick;
break;

if you dont want them to mass even this much you can lower it by changeing the sameclick == to a lower number[/code]
^This tut is NOT mine, nor do i take credits for it
so dont thank me…-.-

Read full topic

so in the end pking should be more like rs so it don’t matter how many times you click you will stay attacking the same speed.
